channel.title: Web Design Contest!
channel.description:
[b]Web design contest![/b] In short: I'm looking for a website that has elegant code and a good [u]unique[/u] design.
You're allowed to use any tools you'd like and markup of choice however I'm going to judge by the end result (i.e. the the html and css that is produced). Source code needs to be posted on GitHub alongside the site preview using GitHub pages.
You must also licence your source code using GPLv3. All submitted work will be released to the community.
[b][I]The Work Must be Strictly Your Own Work[/I][/b]
Prizes are: - 10m OSGP - 2 months RuneScape membership - £10 Amazon Giftcard
The prizes will be given out by choice, so whoever gets first place can choose what they want, second place winner gets what they want out of the 2 left and the 3rd place winner will get whatever is left over.
MITB is apparently unavailable (according to Tom), so he won't be able to hold the prizes.
Contest ends 1st October 2015 - 0:00am GMT+0, time will be extended if needed. Good luck!

item.title: Web Design Contest!
item.dc:creator: @my-swagger my-swagger
item.description:
@my-swagger wrote:

Pwnd:

This is an interesting way to hire someone.

I’m not looking for a website. The sites are being released
Make a site about cooking if you want!
